name: Emmanuel "Manny" Duvelson
title: Executive Vice President
shortBio: Loves being part of an organization that helps the children of Haiti, particularly those easily forgotten. He has been involved with Amour En Action for over two decades and works with the rest of the team to ensure the organization achieves its goals. Along with those duties, Emmanuel sits on the board of Beraca Baptist Church of Brooklyn, NY and is also one of the Pastors at Crossroads Christian Fellowship of Union, NJ, where he leads their Marriage and Family ministry. Emmanuel and his wife Perette have been married for 27 years and have 5 children. They reside in Union, New Jersey.
